column4: Hi, i'm trying to install Ubuntu in a IBM Aptiva Cyrix 586 100Mhz / 24MB RAM... Its BIOS doesn't support CD-ROM boot... how can I do to make it work??
First, are you sure the BIOS doesn't support it at all, and it's not just a configuration issue?
Your other option would be to download a disk image and install from that I suppose.
